name: Solomon Train
description:
How to play:

Your objetive is finalice the travel in the minor time as you can, you have three wagons:

- Cannon, if you click here you can control the cannon, and shoot in cursor direction.

- Bunker, if you click here you generate some STEAM.

- Locomotive, If tou click here your speed in exchange of some STEAM.

If you have no STEAM your train no advence, If an enemy strikes your locomotive provoce lose of  some steam.

-------------------------------------------------

Solomon train its the first videogame of lady toxiclake and dparedesroibas in a game jam and the third of ainhur.

All assets used have been created by us except the font.

Graphics: toxiclake and dparedesroibas.

Sounds: dparedesroibas.

Game design: all team!!!

Programming: ainhur.
